file_insights.purpose: Detailed benchmark report for memory write pattern experiments

patterns_discovered: Write-every-bar performance varies by data size
Buffered writes may improve cache utilization
Cache line behavior impacts write efficiency
gotchas_discovered: Partial cache line writes can cause read-modify-write cycles
Allocation overhead differs across data sizes
Memory bandwidth becomes critical at large data sizes
Write pattern effectiveness depends on data set size
recommendations: Implement adaptive write strategy based on data size
Provide multiple API variants (direct, buffered, into)
